statements: SELECT * FROM project_timelines;
SELECT project_id, project_name, milestone_name FROM project_timelines WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, milestone_name FROM project_timelines WHERE milestone_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT milestone_name, milestone_date FROM project_timelines WHERE project_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY milestone_date ASC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project_timelines WHERE milestone_name IS NOT NULL;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date, milestone_name, milestone_date FROM project_timelines WHERE project_name = 'Project A'
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date, milestone_name, milestone_date, project_id FROM project_timelines WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT milestone_name, milestone_date, project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project_timelines WHERE end_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY milestone_date ASC

SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date, milestone_name, milestone_date FROM project_timelines WHERE milestone_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' AND project_name LIKE '%Project%' ORDER BY project_id
SELECT project_name, project_id, start_date, end_date, milestone_name, milestone_date FROM project_timelines WHERE project_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT * FROM Projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM Projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT milestone_name, milestone_date FROM Milestones WHERE completed = true ORDER BY milestone_date ASC;
SELECT milestone_id, project_id, milestone_name FROM Milestones ORDER BY project_id, milestone_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Projects WHERE project_name LIKE 'Pro%' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, COUNT(milestone_id) AS total_milestones FROM Projects JOIN Milestones ON Projects.project_id = Milestones.project_id GROUP BY project_name ORDER BY total_milestones DESC;
SELECT project_name, milestone_name, milestone_date FROM Projects JOIN Milestones ON Projects.project_id = Milestones.project_id WHERE Milestones.completed = TRUE ORDER BY milestone_date ASC;

SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date, milestone_name, milestone_date FROM Projects LEFT JOIN Milestones ON Projects.project_id = Milestones.project_id WHERE milestone_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY start_date ASC, milestone_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Project;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM Project ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT milestone_name, milestone_date FROM Milestone WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM Task WHERE task_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT task_name, task_status FROM Task WHERE task_status = 'Completed' ORDER BY task_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Project;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM Project ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT task_name, task_status FROM Task WHERE task_status='In Progress';
SELECT milestone_name, milestone_date FROM Milestone WHERE milestone_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT p.project_name, m.milestone_name, t.task_name FROM Project p JOIN Milestone m ON p.project_id = m.project_id JOIN Task t ON m.milestone_id = t.milestone_id;
SELECT * FROM Project;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM Project WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT milestone_name, milestone_date FROM Milestone WHERE project_id = 1 ORDER BY milestone_date DESC;
SELECT task_name, assigned_to, task_status FROM Task WHERE milestone_id = 1 AND task_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT assignee_name, assignee_email FROM Assignee WHERE assignee_id BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Project WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT milestone_name, milestone_date FROM Milestone WHERE milestone_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM Task WHERE task_status = 'In Progress' ORDER BY task_name DESC;

SELECT project_name, milestone_name, task_name, assignee_name FROM Project p JOIN Milestone m ON p.project_id = m.project_id JOIN Task t ON m.milestone_id = t.milestone_id JOIN Assignee a ON t.assigned_to = a.assignee_name;
SELECT assignee_name, assignee_email FROM Assignee WHERE assignee_email IS NOT NULL ORDER BY assignee_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM Projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT status FROM Projects;
SELECT project_name, end_date FROM Projects WHERE status='Active';
SELECT task_name, due_date, status FROM Tasks ORDER BY due_date;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Projects WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT milestone_name, milestone_date, status FROM Milestones WHERE milestone_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT task_name, task_description, due_date FROM Tasks WHERE status = 'Incomplete' ORDER BY due_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM TaskAssignees JOIN Employees ON TaskAssignees.assignee_id = Employees.employee_id;
SELECT project_name, COUNT(*) AS total_tasks FROM Projects JOIN Tasks ON Projects.project_id = Tasks.project_id GROUP BY project_name HAVING total_tasks >= 5;
